name: Stronger_Cubes
description:
a puzzle platformer game.

two brothers get cursed by a witch. now one becomes light weighted and can move freely while other gets heavy. so he cant jump.

you need to find way back to a potion get cured.

i worked this game solo using all my free time after a day job this week. plz leave comments. if you want to see the full version consider following. tanks for playong

INSTRUCTIONS:

  • press 1 to control light
  • press 2 to control heavy
  • press 3 to enter power mode (power mode last only for 10 secs you cant change mode once enterd )
  • WASD to move
  • press the black switch box (only light can press) to pass through the doors.
  • touch the magic potion to win
